overview.en: Clipper is the first decentralized financial ecosystem, that provides payment, exchange, deposit and loan, wealth management and other one-stop cypto financial services. Clipper owns endoresment by investment institutions from both Wall Street and Silicon Valley, guarantee from Hong Kong Blockchain Association, and a professional team with rigorous risk management, secure and legal operation. Clipper adopts CCC (Clipper Coin) as its platform coin, and holders of CCC are eligible to receive daily dividends. The annualized dividend rate is announced as 100 USDT per 10,000 CCC.
overview.zh: Clipper 数币银行是一个去中心化金融生态，为您提供支付，兑换，存贷，理财等一站式数币金融服务。 Clipper 数币银行有华尔街/硅谷投资机构背书，香港区块链协会保证，专业金融团队运营，严谨风控，安全合规。 Clipper 采用 CCC 为平台币，并发放红利：每1万CCC每年享有100USDT的红利，每天发放。
